ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And what will teach you what the Day of Decision is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: How will you comprehend what the Day of Judgement is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: What do you know what the Day of Judgement is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Would that you knew about the Day of Judgment!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And what do you know, what the Day of Decision is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And what will explain to you what is the Day of Sorting Out
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And what will make you comprehend what the day of decision is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And what shall teach thee what is the Day of Decision?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And what will convey unto thee what the Day of Decision is! -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: What will explain to you what the Day of Judgement is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And what knowest thou what the Day of Decision is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And what will show you what is the Day of Judgement!?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And what will explain to thee what is the Day of Sorting out?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And what will explain to you what is the Day of sorting out?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Would that you knew what the Day of Decision is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And what will teach you what the Day of Decision is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And what can make you know what is the Day of Judgement?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:14] And how would you know what the Day of Decision is? — emphasising the enormity of its terror.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And what will convey unto thee) Muhammad (what the Day of Decision is!) How would you know about the Day of Decision?
